title: Aatrox jungle life steal build
body:
I'm a mastery level 5 Aatrox {{champion:266}}  and I've always played him top.

I've heard that he is good in the jungle and i tried but went full life steal is there any other recommendations for what i should build? Any help on what i should build top lane would be a lot of help as well.

replies.body:
I have Aatrox lvl 5 and currently waiting to get more blue essence for lvl 6. Yesterday i tried building Infinity Edge because of the crit... and honestly it is the most broken thing on him. When u go back first, buy the cheapest crit chance item (should be around 400) then buy cheapest attacl speed item, if u r taking damage buy armor if not then get a long sword... trust me on this... it works so well early game... and in late game for some reason u heal like nuts...
Btw a build u should stick to is
Boots of Attack Speed
BOTRK
Ravenous Hydra
Infinity Edge
GA

The last item depends on their team... if they have AP build Maw of Malmortius
If there teams is full AD then i suggest building a little bit more armor or health, or buy more lifesteal like BloodThirster if u r ahead 
**:) GLHF**

Not an Aatrox main or nor do i play him very much. 


So what I think would be good on him would be:

{{item:3153}}: Synergizes with his kit very well must get. 
{{item:3074}} : Optional first rush for better wave clear and burst
{{item:3072}} ,{{item:3812}} pick up if you didn't rush Ravenous
{{item:3742}}, {{item:3143}} : third item
{{item:3065}} : Third item if dealing with a lot of magic damage or otherwise make it fourth. 
{{item:3053}}, {{item:3156}} : Build if dealing with lots of burst.

{{item:3006}} or {{item:3009}} are optimal boots

{{item:1416}}  Only notably good item for the jungle on Aatrox.

Remember to optimize your build to your situation rather than simply following a flat guide.

> AATROX{{champion:266}}  JG IS USELESS UR GANKS ARE BAD UR BETTER OFF USING KASSADIN{{champion:38}}

In what world is Kass better than the Trox in the jungle? I find nothing wrong with his ganks. He offers a knockup, a slow and decent damage.

Aatrox jungle on paper seems good but he has no clearing abilities is forced to build attack speed and life steal and has below average ganking potential, think of him as Warwick without the ult, aatrox is a 3rd tier champion at best
